title: CDW CANADA
author: ''
date: '2022-08-29'
slug: cdw_canada
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $37.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with CDW CANADA. The average
  contract duration was 0.65 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $199.0K.
  The longest contract was 7.82 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $16.9M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '37.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '1,031'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '71'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '7%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '649%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.52'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '59.6M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.65'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '199.0K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '7.82'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '16.9M'
